languages.text: "Не горюй, воин, они все равно исполняют свой долг. Люди, глядя на них, наполняются светом Его и вдохновляются на битву с врагами Человечества!"
"Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"
languages.original_text: "Не горюй, воин, они все равно исполняют свой долг. Люди, глядя на них, наполняются светом Его и вдохновляются на битву с врагами Человечества!"

traits.locale_text: "Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze at them and become filled with His light, inspired for a new fight against the enemies of Humanity!"
"Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze at them and become filled with His light, inspired for a new fight against the enemies of Humanity!"
"Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"
"Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"
"Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"
"Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"
"Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"

languages.text: "Verbannt Eure Trauer, Kriegerin, denn sie dienen noch immer einem Zweck. Die Leute sehen sie und werden vom Licht des Imperators erfüllt, werden inspiriert, mit neuer Kraft gegen die Feinde der Menschheit zu kämpfen!"
languages.original_text: "Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: "Verbannt Eure Trauer, Kriegerin, denn sie dienen noch immer einem Zweck. Die Leute sehen sie und werden vom Licht des Imperators erfüllt, werden inspiriert, mit neuer Kraft gegen die Feinde der Menschheit zu kämpfen!"

languages.text: « Chassez donc votre tristesse, guerrier, car ils ont leur utilité ici aussi. Les gens qui viennent les admirer sentent en leur âme Sa sainte lumière, qui les incite à poursuivre la lutte contre les ennemis de l'humanité ! »
languages.original_text: "Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: « Chassez donc votre tristesse, guerrier, car ils ont leur utilité ici aussi. Les gens qui viennent les admirer sentent en leur âme Sa sainte lumière, qui les incite à poursuivre la lutte contre les ennemis de l'humanité ! »

languages.text: «Destierre su pesar, guerrero, pues aún sirven un propósito. Al mirarlos, ¡la gente se llena de la luz del Emperador y se inspira para luchar de nuevo contra los enemigos de la Humanidad!».
languages.original_text: "Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: «Destierre su pesar, guerrero, pues aún sirven un propósito. Al mirarlos, ¡la gente se llena de la luz del Emperador y se inspira para luchar de nuevo contra los enemigos de la Humanidad!».

languages.text: 「悲しみを捨てよ、戦士。悲しみには目的はない。人々は彼らを見つめ、彼らは主の光に満たされる。そして人類の敵と新たに戦うよう触発されるわ！」
languages.original_text: "Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: 「悲しみを捨てよ、戦士。悲しみには目的はない。人々は彼らを見つめ、彼らは主の光に満たされる。そして人類の敵と新たに戦うよう触発されるわ！」

languages.text: “不必悲伤，勇士，因为它们依然发挥着作用。每当人们凝视着它们时，心里就会充满了帝皇的光明。他们会受到鼓舞，再次鼓起勇气，与人类之敌战斗！”
languages.original_text: "Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"

traits.locale_text: “不必悲伤，勇士，因为它们依然发挥着作用。每当人们凝视着它们时，心里就会充满了帝皇的光明。他们会受到鼓舞，再次鼓起勇气，与人类之敌战斗！”

languages.original_text: "Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"

languages.text: "Hüznünü defet savaşçı. Zira hâlâ bir amaca hizmet ediyorlar. İnsanlar onları seyredalıp O'nun ışığıyla doluyor. İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı savaşmak için yeniden cesaret buluyorlar!"
languages.original_text: "Banish your sorrow, warrior, for they serve a purpose still. People gaze upon them and they become filled with His light, inspired to fight anew against the enemies of Humanity!"
